[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/ledger_db/persisted_auxiliary_info_db.rs] [Critical Path] [Reorg Handling] If the blockchain reorganizes and blocks are rolled back, auxiliary info for rolled-back transactions should be deleted.
